item.title: English Breakfast Blend
item.author: Josh Fairhead
item.description:
“It appears I have no pictures of this one. The packets the same as the other Tea Junction ones and the tea looks like standard BOP. I really wasn’t too sold on this one since it tastes just like Barrys, Lyons or something else uninteresting with strong tannis…”

Tea Details

  • Price: £1.20
  • Quantity: 100g
  • Grade: BOP (Broken Orange Pekoe)
  • Retailer: The Tea Junction Ltd.
    • Address: Level 2 Castle Mall, Norwich, NR1 3DD, UK
    • Phone: +44 1603 661066
